errors.name: BIOGRAPHY_TOO_LONG
errors.message: A biography is limited to 'Θ' characters (< Θ = current biography length).

errors.message: User 'Θ' cannot block (or unblock) himself.

errors.message: User 'Θ' cannot unblock (or block) himself.

errors.name: USER_ALREADY_BLOCKED

errors.name: USER_NOT_BLOCKED
errors.message: User 'Θ' is not blocked.

errors.name: FRIEND_REQUEST_NOT_FOUND

errors.name: CANNOT_SEND_FRIEND_REQUEST_IF_BLOCKED
errors.message: User 'Θ' cannot send 'Θ' a friend request as one or both of them have blocked the other.

errors.name: INVALID_TOKEN
errors.message: Token is invalid and should be discarded.

errors.name: UNDEFINED_TOKEN
errors.message: No token was given in the required fields, please provide a valid one.

errors.name: MULTIPLE_CONNECTIONS
errors.message: User 'Θ' is already connected on another device.

errors.name: CANNOT_DELETE_GLOBAL_CHANNEL
errors.message: Channel 'Θ' cannot be deleted.

errors.message: User 'Θ' cannot delete channel 'Θ' as he is not the host.

errors.name: CHANNEL_NOT_FOUND
errors.message: Channel 'Θ' does not exist.

errors.message: User 'Θ' cannot join channel 'Θ' as he is already a part of it.

errors.name: NOT_ENOUGH_PLAYERS
errors.message: Game 'Θ' does not meet the minimum number of players (Θ < 2).

errors.name: PLAYER_NOT_IN_GAME

errors.name: CURRENT_DOWNTIME
